head: THE FIRST
title: Music and Lyrics
des: I actually never thought to see this kind of movie before, but this movie is the first romatic-comedy movie for me and made me want to watch more this kind of movie. I always feel good and happy when I watch this kind of movie. In addition, the original sound tracks are so good. it made me want to watch this again.

head: THE SECOND
title: A Star Is Born
des: This is another one, I love this movie so much, becasue the star I love cast in this movie. She is Lady GaGa. I am a fan, I like alomost her song, that she sings, very much. And this movie also made me cry. It was so nice to me.

head: AND THE LAST ONE
title: Midnight Sun
des: This is the last favorite movie of mine. This movie tells the story of life with a lover for a limited time. It made me feel interesting. This plot was so awesome. It made me appreciate when living with loved ones in a short time. And this is the another one that made me cry again. Even in the end of the movie was so sad, but the plot was so worthful.
